text: Hi! I just joined this group. I'm working in a HubSpot that has two HubSpot business units. We are trying to set up private content through a separate business unit (new logo header and all) so that it isn't branding the wrong company. I was told that I might be able to find help here. What I understand is that I can edit these "templates" in under actions, but I need help locating the specific lines of html that illustrate the logo header as I'm not that well-versed in html. Can someone help with this?
